# NeuroScript

Neural Architecture Composition Language

## Documentation

- [Compiler Reference](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/compiler): Complete reference for parse, validate, compile, and list commands
- [Introduction to NeuroScript](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/intro)
- [Package Management](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/packages)
- [CLI Reference](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/packages/cli-reference): Complete reference for all package management commands
- [Creating Packages](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/packages/creating-packages): Initialize and structure NeuroScript neuron packages
- [Working with Dependencies](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/packages/dependencies): Add, fetch, and use neurons from external packages
- [Publishing and Security](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/packages/publishing): Sign packages and verify integrity with Ed25519 and SHA-256
- [Primitives](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/primitives)

- [Standard Library](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/stdlib)
- [Conditionals](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/tutorials/conditionals): Route tensors with if/elif/else based on parameters
- [Fork and Join](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/tutorials/fork-join): Split and merge data flows with tuples
- [Higher-Order Neurons](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/tutorials/higher-order-neurons): Pass neuron types as parameters for generic, reusable architectures
- [Match and Guards](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/tutorials/match-guards): Route tensors based on their shape at runtime
- [Shape Inference](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/tutorials/shape-inference): Learn how NeuroScript automatically infers tensor dimensions
- [Unroll](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/tutorials/unroll): Compile-time loop expansion for repeated layers
- [Variadic Ports](https://neuroscript-lang.com/docs/tutorials/variadic-ports): Accept any number of inputs with variadic port declarations
